column2:
"You want to know where Matoi is now?
We're still looking... we'll let you know if anything crops up."
"I'm looking for a way to restore her... Anyways, you should rest."
"No Xiao... You promised me six months ago that you would stop all of these lies."
"Matoi was spotted in Naberius, in the Ruins area. She's just standing there, not moving at all."
"Ulc!"
"It's the obligation of the Administrator to ensure there's no confusion or lies being sent out. You should not be angry, Xiao."
"Besides, aren't you looking for a way to undo it? Maybe <%me> will find something."
"<%me>, do you have something in mind?"
"1. I don't have anything, but I want to help"
"2. I'm always willing to help"
"Ha-ha, that's an unacceptable answer."
"But, that answer is definitely an ARKS answer."
"Because I want to protect that person, I will defend. Because I want to help that person, I will help."
"Everyone's feelings are the same deep down."
"If photons were negatively charged from the strong, negative will, created the [Profound Darkness]..."
"If you were to correct the photons..."
"Maybe you could oppose the [Profound Darkness] using a strong, dedicated, and positive will?"
"1. I want you to have faith in me"
"2. I want you to trust in me"
"Ah, really... I am not qualified as an observer, this is not a logical choice."
"However..."
"Perhaps... this could draw out the answer for me."

"<%me>.
I'll leave it up to you."
"Using the full strength of ARKS, I'll send you to Matoi."
"I don't know the results of the calculations... Even if omniscience becomes unnecessary... I'll leave the future in your hands!"
